Description:
Detects the execution of rundll32.exe with the oledb32.dll library to open a UDL file.
Threat actors can abuse this technique as a phishing vector to capture authentication credentials or other sensitive data.


Author: @kostastsale
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potentially Suspicious Rundll32.EXE Execution of UDL File
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (parent_process_path like '%\explorer.exe' and (process_path like '%\rundll32.exe' and original_file_name = 'rundll32.exe') and ((command like '%oledb32.dll%' and command like '%,opendslfile %' and command like '%\\users\\*\\downloads\\%') and command like '%.udl'))
